This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL button element with accesskey in the shadow tree of open mode promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "Error: We do not support keydown and keyup actions, please use test_driver.send_keys. See crbug.com/893480."
FAIL button element with accesskey in the shadow tree of closed mode promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "Error: We do not support keydown and keyup actions, please use test_driver.send_keys. See crbug.com/893480."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
